result.execSummary:
The defendant Kayla M. Weiks was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Absolute sobriety.
No contact with B.M., C.W., & co-defendant D.W.

Counseling deemed appropriate by agent (individual counseling may benefit defendant).
Letter of apology to victims.
If revoked 260 days credit.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kayla M. Weiks
Current: 702 N 72nd Ave, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 09-15-2017)
Prior: 40 MCT, Medford, WI 54451 United States

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 11:41 a.m. 
**Includes 13CF896, 13CF897, 13CM942, 13CM1018, 13CM1441, 13CM1659, 13CM1954, 14CF93, 14CF94, 14CF633 & 15CF138**
State appears by ADA Michael Puerner. Defendant appears in custody with Attorney Wright Laufenberg. Date & time set for Sentencing Hearing after Revocation on 13CF897, 13CM942, 13CM1018, 13CM1441, 13CM1659, 13CM1954, 14CF93, 14CF94 & 14CF633. Date & time set for Plea/Sentencing Hearing on 13CF896 & Preliminary Hearing & Plea/Sentencing on 15CF138. State files amended information in 13CF896. COURT approves. Reading Waived. Parties proceed with Preliminary Hearing in 15CF138. Waiver of Prelim. filed. Court questions deft. as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. COURT finds PC- defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. Information filed. Reading Waived. Parties proceed with Plea/Sentencing Hearing on 13CF896 & 15CF138.
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief filed.
State moves to: 15CF138- DRI Ct.1- Possession of Methamphetamine, DRI Ct.3- Possess Drug Paraphernalia, DRI Ct.4- Possess Drug Paraphernalia, DRI Ct.5- Possess Drug Paraphernalia.
COURT GRANTS.
PLEA: 13CF896- Ct.1- Theft from Person (PTAC)>>GUILTY
15CF138- Ct.2- Bail Jumping (Felony)(Repeater)>>GUILTY
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made: a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 13CF896- 8 years WI State Prison System, 3 years IC & 5 years ES concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. Defendant is entitled to 401 days credit. Pay 25% of prison wages on restitution in the amount of $200.00 to R.D. which is joint and several with M.D. CC. 
                             15CF138- 5 years WI State Prison System, 2 years IC & 3 years ES concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. Defendant is entitled to 135 days credit. CC & DNA surcharge. 
Parties proceed with Sentencing Hearing on Revocation in all files listed below. Parties are in agreement. Attorney Laufenberg notes history of matter. Defendant addresses court. 
COURT ORDERS: 13CM1018- Ct.1- 9 months MCJ concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. 
                             14CF94- Ct.1- 6 years WI State Prison System, 3 years IC & 3 years ES concurrent to any other sentence currently serving.  
                             13CM942- 9 months MCJ concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. Pay 25% of prison wages on outstanding restitution in the amount of $90.00 to Downtown Pawn.
                             13CM1659- 9 months MCJ concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. Pay 25% of prison wages on outstanding restiution in the amount of $350.00 to Kwik Trip. 
                             13CM1441- 9 months MCJ concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. 
                             14CF93- 6 years WI State Prison System, 3 years IC & 3 years ES concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. Pay 25% of prison wages on outstanding restitution in the amount of $1,250.00 to M.B.
                             13CM1954- 9 months MCJ concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. 
                             14CF633- 6 years WI State Prison System, 3 years IC & 3 years ES concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. 
                             13CF897- Ct.1- 6 years WI State Prison System, 3 years IC & 3 years ES concurrent to any other sentence currently serving. Pay 25% of prison wages on outstanding restitution in the amount of $104.49 to Kwik Trip. Ct.3- 9 months MCJ concurrent to any other sentence currently serving.
Defendant is entitled to 401 days credit on each count in each file revoked. 
CONDITIONS OF ES ON ALL COUNTS AND FILES: Participate in any assessment, treatment & counseling as deemed appropriate by agent, AODA and follow up, submit random UA's at agent's discretion, maintain absolute sobriety, complete 200 hours CS, GFE obtain/maintain FTE and if not, complete 10 hours CS, payment of any outstanding restitution owed that was not paid while in prison. 
Defendant is eligible for CIP/SAP. 
Adj: 12:10 p.m.
